Package com.sri.ai.grinder.theory.base

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDecisionOnAllOrderedPairsOfExpressionsStepSolver
    A context-dependent problem step solver making decisions for literals based on all pairs of expressions in a given list
    AbstractExpressionsSequenceStepSolver<T>
    An extension of AbstractLinearStepSolver that obtains the literals to be tested from a given list of expressions.
    AbstractLinearStepSolver<T>
    An abstract context-dependent problem step solver going over a sequence of integers up to a value n.
    AbstractSelectionStepSolver
    A context-dependent problem step solver taking a list of expressions e1,...,e_n and computing the sub-list e_{j_1},...,e_{j_m} such that all e_i is in the sub-list if and only if the result of invoking AbstractExpressionsSequenceStepSolver.makeLiteralBasedOn(Expression) on e_i is true in the context.
    AbstractSingleVariableConstraintWithBinaryAtoms
    An abstract single-variable constraint solver providing functionality for theories involving only binary atoms.
    AbstractSingleVariableConstraintWithBinaryAtomsIncludingEquality
    An extension of AbstractSingleVariableConstraintWithBinaryAtoms for theories including equality.
    AbstractTheoryWithBinaryAtoms  
    AbstractTheoryWithBinaryAtomsIncludingEquality
    A Theory for constraint theories with binary atoms, including equality.
    AbstractTheoryWithBinaryAtomsTestingSupport  
    AbstractTranslationBasedTheory
    An abstract implementation of {@link Theory) for theories that rely on translating its core problems to another theory's.
    ConstantExpressionStepSolver
    A step solver always returning a constant expression solution regardless of the context.
    ConstantStepSolver<T>
    A step solver always returning a constant solution regardless of the context.
    ExpressionConditionedOnLiteralSolutionStep
    Provides a static method for generating Expression-valued solver steps based on a literal.
    ExpressionWrapperStepSolver<T>
    A context-dependent problem step solver adapting a non-Expression step solver to one in which solutions are wrapped into one by a user-specified function.
    FunctionOnContextExpressionStepSolver
    A step solver always returning the result of a function (on the context) as a Solution.
    LiteralExpressionStepSolver
    A context-dependent problem step solver that simply decides whether a literal is true or not, producing boolean Expression.
    LiteralStepSolver
    A context-dependent problem step solver that simply decides whether a literal is true or not.
    SingleVariableConstraintForTheoryWithoutAtoms
    An implementation of SingleVariableConstraint for theories that define no atoms.
    UnificationStepSolver
